Home » 40P16 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
66 Sanidassanattika, Cittaduka
Sanidassanattika, Cittaduka
112.
273Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…pe…  anidassanaappaṭighaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  avigate cha.
274Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
